Package de.fourzerofournotfound.rateyourstuff.mediamanagement

Class Library

java.lang.Object
de.fourzerofournotfound.rateyourstuff.mediamanagement.Library
public class Library
extends java.lang.Object
Library

This class is used to manage all media and all media collections

    • getMediaListSize

      public int getMediaListSize()

      public Medium getMediumAtIndex​(int index)

    • addNewBook

      public boolean addNewBook​(java.lang.String name, java.time.LocalDate publicationDate, java.lang.String shortDescription, Genre genre, java.util.List<java.lang.String> publishers, java.util.List<Person> authors, java.lang.String isbn, java.util.List<java.lang.String> languages, boolean isEBook, boolean isPrint, int numberOfPages)

      This function is used to add a new book to the collection

      Parameters:
      name - name of the book
      publicationDate - publication date of the book
      shortDescription - a short description of the book
      genre - the main genre of the book
      publishers - a list of publishers
      authors - a list of authors
      isbn - the isbn of the book
      languages - the languages the book is available in
      isEBook - true, if the book is available as eBook
      isPrint - true, if book is available as print media
      numberOfPages - the total number of pages
      Returns:
      true, if the book has been added successfully, false if not

    • addNewMovie

      public boolean addNewMovie​(java.lang.String name, java.time.LocalDate publicationDate, java.lang.String shortDescription, Genre genre, java.lang.String studio, java.util.List<Person> directors, java.util.List<java.lang.String> languages, java.util.List<Person> mainActors, int totalDuration, int ageRestriction, Resolution highestResolution)

      Adds a new movie to the library

      Parameters:
      name - name of the movie
      publicationDate - publication date of the movie
      shortDescription - short description of the movie
      genre - main genre of the movie
      studio - the studio, that produced the movie
      directors - the directors of the movie
      languages - the languages the movie is available in
      mainActors - the main actors
      totalDuration - total duration in minutes
      ageRestriction - age restriction in years
      highestResolution - highest resolution the film is available in
      Returns:
      true, if the movie has been added successfully, false if not

    • checkIfMediumExists

      public boolean checkIfMediumExists​(Medium medium)

      Checks if the given medium exists within the library

      Parameters:
      medium - Medium that should be searched within the library
      Returns:
      true, if the medium has been found, otherwise false

    • addNewSeries

      public boolean addNewSeries​(java.lang.String name, java.time.LocalDate publicationDate, java.lang.String shortDescription, Genre genre, java.lang.String network, java.util.List<Person> directors, java.util.List<Person> actors, java.util.List<java.lang.String> languages, int averageLength, int ageRestriction, Resolution highestResolution, boolean isCompleted)

      Adds a new Series to the library

      Parameters:
      name - name of the series
      publicationDate - publication date of the series
      shortDescription - short description of the series
      genre - the main genre of the series
      network - the network that published the series
      directors - the directors of the series
      actors - the actors of the series
      languages - the languages of the series
      averageLength - the average length of an episode of the series in minutes
      ageRestriction - age restriction in years
      highestResolution - highest resolution the series is available in
      isCompleted - true, if the last episode of the series has already been produced
      Returns:
      true, if the series has been added successfully, false, if not

    • addNewGame

      public boolean addNewGame​(java.lang.String name, java.time.LocalDate publicationDate, java.lang.String shortDescription, Genre genre, float averagePlayTime, java.lang.String publisher, java.lang.String developer, java.util.List<java.lang.String> languages, java.util.List<java.lang.String> subtitles, int minNumberOfPlayers, int maxNumberOfPlayers, java.util.List<java.lang.String> platforms, int ageRestriction)

      Adds a new game to the library

      Parameters:
      name - name of the game
      publicationDate - publication date of the game
      shortDescription - short description of the game
      genre - main genre of the game
      averagePlayTime - average play time that is needed to complete the main game in hours
      publisher - publisher of the game
      developer - studio that developed the game
      languages - list of available spoken language in the game
      subtitles - list of subtitle languages in the game
      minNumberOfPlayers - minimum number of players that is required to play the game
      maxNumberOfPlayers - maximum number of players that can play the game together
      platforms - list of platforms the game is available for
      ageRestriction - age restriction of th game in years
      Returns:
      true, if the game has been added successfully, false if not

    • findMediaCollection

      public Collection findMediaCollection​(java.lang.String name)

      Used to check whether a media collection exists or not

      Parameters:
      name - the title of the collection
      Returns:
      Collection, if collection was found, null, if no collection was found

    • addNewCollection

      public boolean addNewCollection​(java.lang.String name)
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the collection
      Returns:
      false, if adding was not successful, true, if successful

    • removeMediaCollection

      public boolean removeMediaCollection​(java.lang.String name)
      Used to delete a media collection by name, also clears all references to the desired collection
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the collection
      Returns:
      true, if deleting was successful, false, if deleting was not successful

    • removeMedium

      public boolean removeMedium​(Medium medium)

      This function removes a medium from the library, with ratings and comments

      Parameters:
      medium - which will be remove from the library
      Returns:
      true, if the medium is removed; false if not
